skills.name: Wound
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with a sharp blade and inflicts continuous damage for 2 turns with a 50% chance.

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skills.name: Gouge
skills.description: Performs a ruthless charge, attacking all enemies 3 times. Each attack has a 35% chance to inflict Continuous Damage for 1 turn and the skill will deal 50% increased damage to enemies under Continuous Damage Effects.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skill_effect.name: Debuff Bonus Damage
skill_effect.description: Increases damage per debuff on the target

skills.name: Crumble
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 3 times to weaken the Defense and inflicts continuous damage for 2 turns. Increases your Attack Bar by 10% per Continuous Damage granted on the enemies after the attack.

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.
